attributes.review:
When I signed into the app and put in my information, the app crashed and along went my account. I tried contacting the customer service but they said they only accept “code orange problems” 😡😡 I’m very unhappy with my experience.

BUT WAIT, THERE’S MORE
After I made a fourth, yes you heard me right, fourth account attempting to make an account, a notification popped up saying “we’re sorry, but this app is no longer accepting incompetent gen z teenagers anymore.”
WTH?! Are you generationist? 😡😡😡
ellen degeners 2020🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸❤️❤️
attributes.title: HORRIBLE Customer Service

attributes.review: This app is absolutely ABSURD?!?! It took FOREVER to download. Like what was this app doing while I waited for it to fully load?? Did it go back in time all the way to the year 1759, jump Benjamin Franklin, steal the key and kite, bring it back to modern times and conduct that sh*t all over again? And don’t even get me started on the format. The worlds were so little, so unreadable y’all might as well have put nothing at all. And how DARE you ask for MY PERSONAL information.... you want my phone number? My phone number for WHAT?!?  If I wanted to share my number so anybody could see and text me I would have gone to a str*p club and painted it on a respectable sex workers a**.  This app is useless, why even get this app if I need to put personal information when yOURE the one supposed to be giving the information? Horrible. Absolutely HORRIBLE.
attributes.title: Mortified

attributes.review: This app makes everyone feel bad so not get unless you want to be tortured.This dorito we call our president is just trying to make our lives miserable.This app deserves a 0 star rating but unfortunately that is impossible.❤️ the truth
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: You wanna take away tik tok, but it’s the one thing that has brought our entire generation together I’ve never met someone who hasn’t had tik tok downloaded at one point. For me I’ve made so many amazing friends and the app literally saved my life like I was really depressed when I started making videos then people liked my twisted humor and somehow I got 40k people to follow me and they have been the most supportive people and they are my motivation to keep living. please don’t take this away.
attributes.title: It’s not over without a fight.

attributes.review: i had heard from my friend how good this app was, and i was super excited to download it! unfortunately, it was absolute trash.  -100/10
attributes.title: so disappointed!!! 😢😢😭😭
